trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>事件时的插入按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入") 在控件内单击时，但之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件插入记录。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查插入操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定受 insert 操作的记录数，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性以确定是否发生任何异常。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要访问插入的记录的值，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件返回到所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>后插入操作的属性。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在插入操作期间发生异常，则可以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件在插入模式下设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs> 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs> object passed to the event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs>对象传递到事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>事件，以确定是否在插入操作期间发生了异常。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 受插入操作影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the exception raised when the insert operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 对象，表示执行插入操作时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: If no exception was raised, use <see langword="null" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引发异常，则将 <see langword="null" /> 用于此参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `affectedRows` 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=nameWithType> object contained in the `e` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象中包含`e`参数。

trans-unit.source: Initialized to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 初始化为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Initialized to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 初始化为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 在引发事件时，将主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取受插入操作影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 受插入操作影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property to determine the number of records affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性来确定的插入操作所影响的记录数。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was inserted in the following situations:
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于验证在以下情况下插入了正确的记录数：

trans-unit.source: Verify that only a single record was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 验证已插入单个记录。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an improperly written insert statement can insert multiple records.
trans-unit.target: 有时，编写不当 insert 语句可以插入多个记录。

trans-unit.source: Verify that a record was inserted when an error occurs during the insert operation that does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 验证在不会引发异常的插入操作期间发生错误时已插入一条记录。

trans-unit.source: Verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls, has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 验证是否已插入一条记录，当数据源控件的支持冲突检测 （乐观并发），如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Under this setting, a record that has the same key value as a record by another user concurrently might not be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 在此设置，则可能无法插入同时具有相同的密钥值作为由另一个用户记录的记录。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property to verify that a record was inserted during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性以验证在插入操作期间已插入一条记录。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 对象，表示插入操作过程中引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性以确定异常 （如果有） 插入操作过程中引发。

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件重新引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether an exception was raised during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性来确定是否在插入操作期间引发了一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 当在插入操作期间引发了异常时，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，将异常认为是进行处理并且不会重新引发。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件重新引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作完成后 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控件是否仍保持插入模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在插入操作完成后仍保持插入模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件返回到所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件插入操作完成后应保留在插入模式。

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制在插入模式下，将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 （如正在引发的异常） 发生的情况下需要与往常一样行为不同的控件时，应使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件需要保持在插入模式下，默认情况下，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>属性改为。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode when an exception occurs during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>属性以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件置于插入模式在插入操作期间发生异常时。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含已插入记录所对应的字段名/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: 一个含有字典的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 对象，其中包含已插入记录所对应的键字段名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>属性来访问用于插入的记录的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录插入的记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>实现对象<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects that represent the fields of the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType>表示插入的记录的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的字段名称，使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>属性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同样，通过使用访问的字段值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>直接对象访问该字段值。

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 只能按索引访问字段值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何循环访问中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>集合。
